synopsis.text: Alien encounters and romantic entanglements abound in this comedic anime! Rito Yuuki's life takes a turn for the extraordinary when Princess Lala, a naked alien from the planet Develuke, inadvertently proposes to him in his bathtub. Despite his feelings for his childhood crush, Haruna, Rito finds himself engaged to Lala and navigating the complexities of intergalactic politics and customs. Lala, determined to win Rito's affections, faces competition from Rito's growing harem, including her own mischievous twin sisters, Nana and Momo. Amidst Lala's chaotic inventions, Yami's relentless pursuit to assassinate Rito, and the challenges of everyday life, Rito must navigate this unpredictable journey filled with laughter, love, and the occasional perilous situation. Will Rito ever confess his true feelings, or will the cosmos have other plans? Join this motley crew for a thrilling and hilarious ride that transcends galaxies!
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
